title: Former Google CEO on Investing in AI
description:
Eric Schmidt, who led Google for a decade, talks automated warfare, stock-picking computers and the future of humanity. Plus, we let a robot take over the podcast.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
